verbs.description: [ARG0: European leaders] [V: reacted] [ARG2: with dismay but determination] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump announced that the United States will pull out of the nuclear agreement with Iran and impose tough new sanctions] .
